website_summaries.verdict: Well-made socks that stand up to hours of use from a top name in athletics.
pros: Customers called out the comfort, quality construction, and good fit of these socks
They also stand out for being breathable, and some users noted they held up beautifully for hours of walking and climbing
cons: Rare issues with sizing and pilling after washing were mentioned

customer_reviews.title: FAKES?
customer_reviews.text: Noticed so far that the black socks are missing letters and the puma cat NOT COOL. I paid for PUMA socks and should have received PUMA socks
customer_reviews.author: ANN MARIE ACEVEDO

customer_reviews.title: but I found these for a good price and assumed they would be a bit better ...
customer_reviews.text: I do not wear puma really, but I found these for a good price and assumed they would be a bit better quality than a random type sent from China. Let me tell you, these are now my FAVORITE socks. They’re so comfy, they don’t move on my feet, and they fit just right. Not to mention they have a bit of moisture wicking ability. Will DEFINITELY purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Laken Gross

customer_reviews.title: Great for nurses!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect! I am not a runner, but a nurse on my feet most, if not all, of a 12 hour day. The cushioning in the arch is just enough to be supportive, with out making the sock too warm. The cut is perfect, hitting just above where both my Nike's and Asics hit. Have the black version, and love the little pop of color, but wish there were a navy blue version with the same kind of pop!
customer_reviews.author: LissaLou

customer_reviews.title: Finally a Sock That Stays On!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these socks after reading a lot of positive reviews about the size and the support. I wear a women's size 10 and have in the past had a very difficult time finding no-show athletic socks that fit the whole length of my foot. If I do manage to find socks that fit, they always slide down my heel in my tennis shoe. These ones fit, are soft and comfortable, and stay up! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MakingReviewsonAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Great socks!
customer_reviews.text: There were some snags on one sock when I opened the package, but the snags evened out when I put the sock on (see next photos). I’m a size 12 and these fit perfect. I think these are the most comfortable low cut socks out there. My last set of Puma socks lasted for 2 years with a few of them just now starting to get small holes in them and that’s with walking, running, hiking and walking around the house in them. Great price, quality and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: A.E.D.

customer_reviews.title: Puma👌🏽
customer_reviews.text: These socks are so comfortable!!!! They're not thin as someone else commented. They're thick and warm. Great material!!!! The colors are vibrant, which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Giana&Javier

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Socks for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: I ddn't even realize how much I loved these socks until I got behind on my laundry and had to wear my old socks one morning. What a huge difference in comfort! These are super comfortable and are just the right thickness. I walk 5 miles every morning in the Florida heat and humidity and these aren't too hot, but are still very cushy and supportive. Just the right height, the seams aren't annoying and the arch band makes a big difference. I wear a size 7 running shoe and these socks fit perfectly. Love them! And the price is very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Hyndsight

customer_reviews.title: Great sock.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, They are fitted to shape of foot but not binding. Keep in mind I wear a women's 8 & 1/2 wide. These socks aren't tight or sagging. They are my favorite socks. They are not a heavy, winter weight sock, for outdoors wear but great 3 season socks. (I live in a snow region) I will buy these socks again and again. Great quality. They have held up well in washer and dryer.
customer_reviews.author: shthd62

customer_reviews.title: Love These!  Would Certainly Buy More...
customer_reviews.text: I love these socks. They are of excellent quality. They are thick enough to provide the perfect level of support and cushion that I like. I would certainly recommend these socks for use when wearing sneakers and walking, running, or doing any other type of workout. However, if you are the type of person that prefers thin socks, this isn't for you--I much prefer the thicker socks with good cushion, so they are perfect for me. Also, I'm size 7.5 shoe and these socks fit very well. They're not too tight or too loose, and they don't slide down into my shoes. I plan to purchase more of these next time I need some more socks!
customer_reviews.author: Rylie James

customer_reviews.title: Paper-thin, too small with no stretch
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in these socks. They are paper-thin and have no stretch. They also fit quite small -- which would be fine if they had a little stretch, but they don't. I have other Puma socks which I love -- I almost wonder if these are knock-offs. They are very poor quality. I wear size 8.5 and these are advertised as 9-11. There is NO way these would fit a size 11 foot! I have to pull and pull to get them on my size 8.5. Don't waste your money on these. - Heather
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Nelson

customer_reviews.title: NICE BREATHABLE THINNER SOCK
customer_reviews.text: If you like a thinner material in a sock, then you will really like these! They by far are NOT made cheaply just a thin sock!...They do not make my feet sweat and they are very comfortable. They also do NOT leave a red ring around my ankle or too tight n cut off some circulation like other socks I wear.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie C

customer_reviews.title: My kind of quality 👍🏽!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought some puma socks a couple of years ago at a Burlington store, and they were thick and beyond comfortable, just how I like them. With that being said I decided to search for some more on Amazon and tadaa!! These are thick puma socks that come with a breathability feature and the comfort of my liking. *If you are looking for thin socks these are not for you. *They stop just below the ankle😊. *Are great for longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Kiara

customer_reviews.title: My favorite socks
customer_reviews.text: These are so cushy and comfortable, they are my favorite socks to wear with sneakers for running, walking, and exercise. I also just wear them around the house to keep my feet a comfortable temperature. The colors are also super fun and cheerful. I have now purchased two sets of these. Alas, they are not immune to the laundry goblins.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Satin

customer_reviews.title: Fabrics are not as described!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these socks only because the description says it is 30% cotton (65% polyester, 5% spandex). It arrived and the label says it 95% polyester, 3% rubber and 2% spandex. NO COTTON!!!! Liers!!!
customer_reviews.author: Artem Astafiev

customer_reviews.title: Good socks
customer_reviews.text: I love Puma socks. They’re my favorite. Bought these off amazon for the first time. I like how they hug the middle of my foot. They are a little thinner on the top but it works out because my sneakers fit a little tight already.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I wear a women’s 5.5 and these socks are way too big. Super bummed because I like the quality so I just wear them with boots/high tops
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SOFT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The SOFTEST thick athletic socks ever. I absolutely love these socks! They're extremely durable, breathable, and so incredibly soft. A bit thick but not too thick for summer. Also love the patterns/design of the puma. Not disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle

customer_reviews.title: Not made for size 10 or big feet woman
customer_reviews.text: The socks are soft. But they don’t fit a woman that wears a size 10 in shoes. They were so tight and uncomfortable at the end of the day you could see the outline of the rim of the sock around my ankle and the puma logo on my foot as well. I was really hoping after washed them al they would stretch some in fabric and nope I was wrong. So now I have o by some new socks cause I threw the old socks out :(. So ladies if you were a size 10 or bigger I don’t recommend. And my feet aren’t wide either. I’m a very slender woman.
customer_reviews.author: Tickenhawk

customer_reviews.title: Love These!
customer_reviews.text: These socks exceeded my expectations! They are super comfy and fit very well without sliding or excess material (I wear a women’s 7.5-8). I bought them for working out but I’ve been wearing them for daily use as well because they are so comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: SBCG

customer_reviews.title: perfect! especially if you like holes and ill-fitting socks!
customer_reviews.text: the sizing is all over the place on these. some are tiny and some huge. I've bought these for years but in the last two purchases I've seen a real decrease in quality. the fasteners the manufacturer uses to bundle the socks together are also causing holes in the socks, my last package over half the pairs had holes big enough to put my finger thru. unfortunately I'll have to find something different now.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, these aren't like my old Puma pairs of socks that almost look identical. I wear a size 9 and these are a little tight on me, almost to the point they are uncomfortable. I loved my old pairs in the same exact colors, they fit great and were just getting old, so I thought I would replace them with the same ones. The new one ones are a lot thinner, with less cushion and more of a see through on the top. I guess I'm going to have to shop around with other brands again. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: C. Keller

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I dont have a rubber allergy
customer_reviews.text: Not as described! These are not "terry" They aren't "Half-Terry". They are a blend of MOSTLY polyester, some cotton, some spandex and some RUBBER. I'm glad I dont have a rubber allergy, but this is NOT stated on the description and it should be. They are lower than the photo suggests, the band is very thin, and they socks are thin. Very disapppointed after I spent way too much time selecting these. These were very highly recommended, but I don't know why. I won't order Pumas again.
customer_reviews.author: duitsvno

customer_reviews.title: Puma's Socks Are Fierce!
customer_reviews.text: I've fallen in love with these socks. I've been wearing white socks for a long time and they never stayed white looking even with bleach. I've now discovered the gray low cut ankle sock by Puma. YAY! These socks wash and wear very well. They don't get holes in them like my other socks did after a couple wears. These Puma socks don't bunch up or fall down in my shoes when I run. These Pumas have sold me completely!
customer_reviews.author: D-hiker

customer_reviews.title: Great Socks, BUT...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the black, gray, and white 6-pack and received no white socks. Ironically, these white socks would be the ones that I would wear the most. I really like the socks and would like to order again, but I’m afraid of another mixup with my order...even if its all one color...like white.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Just go to Walmart or Costco for socks.
customer_reviews.text: These suck. Compared to the puma socks you can buy at Walmart or Costco these are cheap, thin, and poorly made. At least half of them have gotten holes in them and been thrown away (including one the first day of wear) when the socks are only about 3 months old, and I keep a lot of socks to avoid wearing them out. These suck. I would honestly rather buy generic brand socks at my local Kroger because, in my experience, they’re not as cheaply made. The only reason I didn’t return them is because I didn’t realize they were the socks I’d just purchased when they started getting holes, since I own so many puma socks.
customer_reviews.author: Acacia

customer_reviews.title: Women’s size 12 feels great!
customer_reviews.text: I have women’s size 12 feet, and I really enjoy these socks. These are the only athletic socks I buy. They fit great and breath great when sweating. Because my feet are bigger, the elastic does create a mark on my skin, but it is by far the least painful, low cut sock I’ve owned.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi Dean

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for black socks to go with my black athletic shoes that didn't fall down while wearing them. When I received them I was surprised to find how thin they were. I thought it might make them less sturdy but I have found them to be very soft and haven't had any issues with them sinking down into my shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: 6 pack = 6 pairs
customer_reviews.text: I had these socks before and ordered some more after multiple years of wear. I like them a lot. I'm writing this to say that the 6 pack is 6 pairs of socks (even though the picture shows 6 individual socks). I couldn't find that information anywhere before I ordered, so hopefully this helps someone figure out the deal better.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Very comfie, perfect fit, attractive.
customer_reviews.text: I've worn them only once so far for walking. I needed a thin sock for my smaller sized "barefoot" shoes (6.5, I usually wear 7). They fit snugly, r very comfortable, and look good. They r not rayon, as described, but 95% polyester, 3% rubber and 2% spandex. I will be ordering more as I walk a lot. I find polyester sox to be a little warm so I was curious how rayon would feel, but these r keepers. My favorite heavier Columbia sox have the same make-up.
customer_reviews.author: GRETA G.

customer_reviews.title: Thin and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: These socks are very thin, and made of a material that slides around in the shoe. They are not soft. They feel more like a thin, dress sock than an athletic sock. Was expecting some cotton cushioning in these socks, like the Puma so SK I have had in the past. These were a huge disappointment. Uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: MABB

customer_reviews.title: Very thin material and run small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 6 pack of black/Grey sock for my job as a nurse on my feet for 12hr shifts. Definitely too small for shoe size 9. They slide off of the heel the second you put them on. They are also a super thin/light material, no cushion at all like described. Very disappointing when they got good reviews. The white pack with bright colors I ordered as well and they are much better and fit totally different. Wish they were both the same product as they're under the same listing.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great socks
customer_reviews.text: I go thru socks! Either my dog chews them or I wear them out I am on my feet all day. I work at a hospital. These are semi supportive but the give just the right amount of pressure They stay out and don’t slink down below the shoe. They keep my feet dry. I put them thru the ringer and they always hold up. They just won’t survive the jaws of a teething Doberman puppy! I highly recommend these if you are on your feet a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Viki A.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, stay in place, long lasting.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for, these grey Puma sox r attractive, showing off ankles and complementing shoes, and r comfortable. I've been wearing one pair from the grey/black/white set for weeks now w no slippage or signs of wear. They're the same sox, tho I prefer the placement of the Puma logo on the others. I bought the set of all-grey bc grey looks best w all of my shoes.
customer_reviews.author: GRETA G.

customer_reviews.title: Finally a victory in life LOL. yippie
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect I don’t have a men’s size 11 1/2 foot so those 9 to 11 socks that they sell everywhere and only those sizes don’t fit me!! These on the other hand fit perfectly! They are exactly what the package says they are no-See ankle socks. Not ankle plus two inches!!! I like these. I will most definitely order these again if I need to. I am pretty hard on socks and they still are in perfect condition I expect they will last a long time. Finally a victory in life LOL
customer_reviews.author: Athyna

customer_reviews.title: Puma socks are the best
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of Puma socks, these are a great addition to my collection, they're a thicker sock in the sole, they're seemingly durable thus far, they're comfortable for all-day wear but occasionally I get that annoying heel slip depending on the shoes I'm wearing and nothing feels worse to me than half of my foot being naked inside of a shoe! This could just be because my feet are on the smaller side of the sizing, I'd still recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Suki

customer_reviews.title: Not quite the right size but good material
customer_reviews.text: I needed a size 11 sock but these socks are for 9-11 so that means I'm at the outer edge of fitting. They fit Ok but I just wish they were a little bit 'looser' - good material
customer_reviews.author: P J Swenson

customer_reviews.title: Thin and Got Holes
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like that these socks are very thin, I have some other socks of this brand that have been great but these socks just don’t cut it. The seems rub on my toes when walking, especially my pinky toes so they get red and irritated. These don’t offer much support either, they don’t feel as snug nor as heavy duty as the Puma socks I got before these. Also they started to develop holes after a few weeks, a really don’t like them.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Linnell

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but a little less comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the grey socks. They are good looking but a little less on the comfortable side. I picked the correct size for my feet and it’s not that they are tight, just that the seams on the inside above my toes dig in a little. I would say wear them inside out but... they are puma socks. I don’t want to embarrass myself by having them inside out on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Cayllea

customer_reviews.title: mediocre
customer_reviews.text: The quality of these socks is just average, the inside of the socks is like a loose threads galore. They are okay for light use, don't count on them lasting too long for sports use. Won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: C.F

customer_reviews.title: Too snug
customer_reviews.text: Really tight. Good colors and variety, but they are very snug. Some very athletic girls would probably love them, but this 70 year old grandma likes them not quite so tight. Gonna give them to charity box.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Only Socks I Own
customer_reviews.text: I only own one type a sock at a time to prevent the “lost lone sock”. I wear these everyday and am on my feet a lot. Great at containing moisture. Comfortable. They’ll go about 6 months before they start to smell with regular wear (that sounds like I don’t wash them after every wear but I do). Just notice around the 6 month mark they’ll start to smell more than normal. I have purchase twice now. Buy two packs at time and throw out the old ones :-) Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable no-shows
customer_reviews.text: These are great! They're very comfortable. I was worried that, because they are thicker, that it would cause my feet to sweat more. However, the way that they are designed leaves me believing that they really do wick away the sweat and keep my shoes from getting too smelly. The compression aspect is gentle yet very comfortable. They're holding up well after a few months of washing. I love 'em.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Fit great, just the right amount of cushion, and best of all they don't slide no matter how much walking I do. I'm ordering another pack after I submit this review!
customer_reviews.author: Christina W

customer_reviews.title: Too think and slippery
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a typical athletic sock. These are so thin and slippery my feet slide around in my sneakers. They feel more like a dress sock. Waste of money. I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: online shopper

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I am really disappointed with this purchase. I wear shoe size 8, the socks are really tight and cut into my ankles and hurt after a couple of hours of wearing. Also, as shown in the picture several socks lost part of their stitching after just one wash (normal warm cycle). The socks are really thick too.
customer_reviews.author: K. D.

customer_reviews.title: Relatively Good quality but random holes
customer_reviews.text: Good socks, lightweight and soft material. But I was very disappointed to put on a pair this morning and see this big hole on the side. Wish they checked to make sure there were no holes before they sold it to me.
customer_reviews.author: L. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good long lasting socks
customer_reviews.text: Considering these socks are from amazon, I’m fairly satisfied with these. This is my second time ordering (ordered the first ones in April 2019) and most of my original ones held up. I’m just horrible and lose socks all the time so I had to order more. They fit pretty good- I have wide feet so they do fit a smidge snug but nothing to where I’d say they are too small.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Gill

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as they were size 9-13 Upon receiving them written on the package was Sock size 9-13 Shoe size 5-9 Go figure. They were tiny gave them to my 12 year old daughter
customer_reviews.author: Islandd

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable sock
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable sock. Good fit. My only complaint is that they are a little slippery in my sneakers and my foot slides around a little.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: Not as described in the comments. Very thin, not cushy, or good for nursing... I’ll keep, because the shops are closed, but I’m disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: PMW

customer_reviews.title: warning! Contains rubber, which is latex.
customer_reviews.text: The socks are nicely packaged, and I thought it was a good price. However, they contain no cotton! If you care about what your clothes are made of, the information is incorrect. The socks do not have any cotton, which is what I was looking for. The socks are actually 95% polyester/3% RUBBER/2% spandex. I do not wish to wear "rubber", so I sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: beth

customer_reviews.title: Too thin
customer_reviews.text: I gave three stars because these socks are super thin and have no padding so I wanted to return them and they refunded me without having to return them. So that was nice. If you’re looking for thin socks, these are for you. Otherwise, if you want any kind of support or cushion, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: The Socks that were delivered are not the ones in the picture. I have ordered these 3 times now and only got the right socks once. The socks in the picture get five stars. They are a great weight and have the right band under the arch. The socks that came are so thin with no arch support. Very disappointed but don't want to go through the hassle of returning.
customer_reviews.author: momma2T

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: The size for these socks are 9-11. I wear a size 9, and was surprised to find that the socks were a bit snug. I literally had to stretch the sock over my foot to make it fit comfortably. It is thinner than I expected. Just an average sock, no cushioning at all. Too much trouble to return, and I will not be purchasing this again.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Back of the heal way too low! I would call NO SHOW.  They slip underneath my heal and are usless.
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't call these half socks. The back of the heal doesn't even come up to my ankle if the heal is positioned correctly. They are what I would call "no show" and I absolute hate this new style. The picture with the feet in them is misleading as the back is NOT that high, at least not on my heal. No show socks move down into my shoe and under my heal, what is the point?
customer_reviews.author: SciFi lover

customer_reviews.title: Too much synthetic material
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace my old Puma socks, and I thought they were the same. They're not. These new socks have a lot more synthetic material and are thinner. I don't mind that they're thinner, but the synthetic material doesn't breathe and isn't absorbent. I don't like them.
customer_reviews.author: MrsV

customer_reviews.title: Sssoft to touch!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these socks because I'm always in need of socks, especially for Chicago wintery weather, and you just have to love the puma logo. As I mention in the the headline ,the socks are quite soft feeling. Hope they last a respectable length of time.
customer_reviews.author: Ahnah

customer_reviews.title: I dont think these Puma socks are legit.
customer_reviews.text: I dont think these Puma socks are legit. They slip off all the time and all my puma socks I got from Fred Meyer dont slip off
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Noratak

customer_reviews.title: Wear down quickly
customer_reviews.text: I love these socks, they are comfy! But...they wear away quickly. After just a few wears I already have holes in them.
customer_reviews.author: jh

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I wore these yesterday for the first time and went for a walk. I got home, took off my shoes and there is already a hole in one of them. I'm disappointed in the quality, they should last more than one wear. I had heard Puma socks were great, very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect - not too thick, not too thin, doesn't ride down
customer_reviews.text: When I needed more workout socks to replace other old ones, I came back to this particular type. These socks are just perfect in thickness. They are comfortable, low profile and best of all, they don't ride down and do not lose their qualities wash after wash. Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Addict

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again!!!Even better in person💕
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the socks I've been wearing two pairs of socks for the past year when I work and all I need is one pair of these! The price isn't bad at all especially because they're real Puma socks . But they're very soft they kind of have cushion to them but they're not too much to where it's hot they're just right!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda w

customer_reviews.title: Small for size 10 feet
customer_reviews.text: Very small, but in their defense, I wear a female size 10 shoe. So, I encounter this problem often. When wearing them the only thing people can see is the cute and bright color which gives some character to my boring black non slip tennis shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Have consistently bought Puma No Show Athletic socks. Most ...
customer_reviews.text: Have consistently bought Puma No Show Athletic socks. Most have lasted some years. These all developed holes within a week or two of wearing. Obviously a different material formulation than some other models.
customer_reviews.author: Nash-O

customer_reviews.title: These are great
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set of Puma socks. My first ones are black and identical in shape and fit. I’ve been wearing these for Zumba for the last few weeks and they don’t budge! I have a normal width foot; not narrow or wide, and wear a size 9.5 shoe. I would not hesitate to buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Please Buy Them
customer_reviews.text: I really like these footies. I have size 11 woman’s feet and they fit perfect. They have been washed several times with no shrinkage. I do recommend this item especially to the customers with a larger foot size.
customer_reviews.author: LoveToShop

customer_reviews.title: Back for more ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these Puma socks in black about two years ago and have worn them CONSTANTLY. Only now are they starting to wear out and get holes, so I'm back to replace them. Super comfortable, great quality, really absorbent, and have clearly stood the test of time. Highly recommend without reservation. (Who knew I could get so excited about socks, of all things?)
customer_reviews.author: negative creep

customer_reviews.title: Pilling like crazy after one wash
customer_reviews.text: I loved these socks when I bought them 4 years ago. I repurchased in Feb of 2020, same style, the black with neon colors, and after one wash, they’ve all pilled and look so old. I still have a few pairs of the originals I bought years ago, and they actually look newer than the set I just bought. It’s not the end of the world, but just me mindful something has changed with the materials of these socks. They’re still comfortable, they just look Old after one wash because of the pilling, so I was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Riss

customer_reviews.title: 😇
customer_reviews.text: I like how they got light weight and comfortable and short I don’t like long socks
customer_reviews.author: annetteresendiz

customer_reviews.title: Fiber content incorrect
customer_reviews.text: I was careful to select 2 packs that listed some cotton content. However, when I received them and saw the packaging, they contain zero cotton. Already took all the little plastic tags out so I’m not going to bother returning them. If they make my feet too hot and sweaty I’ll just give them away.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Dequaine

customer_reviews.title: 1 year
customer_reviews.text: After 1 year the stocks have finally hit the trash can. They began to get little tears at the bottom. I wore these socks out. But for them to last for more than a year is a huge bonus. Only thing I didnt like is after 8 months they began to get saggy and when I wear shoes, they would slide off and I'd have to pull them back up. But when I first got them they fit very snug
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great and so cute!!
customer_reviews.text: When you put these on you can feel the support in them. Use these for cleaning houses, most clients don't want shoes worn in their homes. I can defiantly feel the difference when I wear these compared to normal socks.
customer_reviews.author: Tatum K

customer_reviews.title: Fit a little tight in the ankle/calf
customer_reviews.text: As someone with larger calves/ankles, Puma socks usually fit me really well. For some reason, this design fits a little snug around my ankle and lower calf. For that reason, I decided to return them. The thickness of the socks and fit in the foot otherwise are nice.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Braga

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfortable with Arch Support
customer_reviews.text: Love these socks. I have reordered more as well. I took these with me to wear in my sneakers on a deployment to Afghanistan. They offered great support on the arches as well as stood up to the washing machines and driers over there (think laundry mat quality and divide by 2). Super sturdy. Biggest problem is I keep losing them. whomp whomp
customer_reviews.author: Nell

customer_reviews.title: I will probably order another set of these socks in different colors
customer_reviews.text: The I'm going to school socks are exactly what I wanted. The perfect is fit they are good quality and they go well with my shoes I love these socks.
customer_reviews.author: GHLEE

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I love these socks. This is the second time I've bought these. They are made well and they fit perfectly. Also a good thickness which is sometimes hard to find in women's socks. They are really cute too.
customer_reviews.author: Shaye

customer_reviews.title: Not rayon!
customer_reviews.text: The fabric composition is incorrect on this page. They are pretty much polyester - not soft at all. They do have a nice low cut so they would probably not show in athletic shoes, but they do seem to run a bit small (I am 6.5 to 7 and they are comfortably snug).
customer_reviews.author: Kelly N. Haas

customer_reviews.title: Best Socks Ever
customer_reviews.text: Amazing price for a 6 pack, and they came pretty fast! Its always such a struggle to find the socks that fit comfortable without being too tight or too loose but these ones are just perfect and they don't slip off in my shoe like every other pair would. I usually wear a size 9 or 10 in shoes and these socks fit so perfectly, I'm literally obsessed. I love how every pair has different color on the logo. The material is amazingly soft and does't make my feet sweat at all, its been almost a month since i received them and even after wearing them every single day they are still looking like new and have no rips.
customer_reviews.author: Starchild_3321

customer_reviews.title: Shrink a bit
customer_reviews.text: I wear these around the house, but these are supposed to be running socks. I would never run in these. They are thin, snag toenails while running, and offer no cushioning at all. So I just wear these for casual walking.
customer_reviews.author: HummingbirdsTop Contributor: Running

customer_reviews.title: All match!
customer_reviews.text: I wear an 8.5 women’s and have a hard time finding socks that don’t ride down. These fit great. Also like that every sock is exactly the same because nothing is worse than needing to find the one with the purple band that got lost in the laundry and not being able to make matches when folding the clothes
customer_reviews.author: Mic Mac

customer_reviews.title: Durable. Great sneaker socks
customer_reviews.text: Fits great in sneakers and boots (don’t ride down). Thick in just the right places. Hold up well through lots of wears and washes. Doesn’t make my feet super sweaty but I wouldn’t call them super breathable. Nice combination of both I think.
customer_reviews.author: William’s Mum

customer_reviews.title: sometimes super tight. Some are soft and some aren't
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these same sock several times and the fit is not consistent. Sometimes too large, sometimes super tight. Some are soft and some aren't.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Material is very sheer/see through, not supportive or sweat absorbing at all.
customer_reviews.text: Fits my size 8 foot perfectly however, they are very thin and sheer, almost see through. When working out my foot slides around in my shoe. I will only use these indoors without shoes on from now on. Not supportive or sweat absorbing at all.
customer_reviews.author: Trista

customer_reviews.title: Thin, already have holes
customer_reviews.text: I got these to replace some puma socks I got at Costco that I use to run it. These ones are much thinner and in the month I’ve had them, already have holes. I’ve worn each pair maybe twice. These are not good for running and not well made.
customer_reviews.author: JRW

customer_reviews.title: Who knew I would love socks so much?!
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfortable, have the right amount of squish, and have an even squishier, snuggier, center portion around the middle of my foot. They're awesome. I'm glad 6 come in a pack so I don't run out before laundry day, although I try to be fair to my other socks and rotate... but if I only had to wear these forever and ever, I'd be ok with that.
customer_reviews.author: Swanbird

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, breathes well, nicely padded.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable walking/jogging (and I'm sure running) sock. They're padded but not too thick and tight enough not to slide around, these also breathe fairly well. I have noticed that they become dingy on the bottom rather quickly but it's a sock. I've had them for roughly three months now and they don't seem to be getting loose or helping cause blisters.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Soft, but thin material tore within two uses.
customer_reviews.text: The socks are nice and soft and comfortable. However they're a very thing material and tore within first two uses. It's not like I have any heavy running or anything. But now I have two pairs with holes in them. Would have expected them to last longer. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Shivangi Kanitkar

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I honestly wasn't expecting much from these socks because I've only ever had one type of socks that I felt more than just meh about. But these are FANTASTIC. They first perfectly, they are great quality, so freaking comfortable. My only complaint is that a few of the socks came with runs in them. But overall these are amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Little Lady

customer_reviews.title: Great for smaller feet 5-6 US.
customer_reviews.text: If you have small feet 5-6 US these are great! They also have a nice amount of cushion. Puma socks I have bought in the past last forever. I don’t think these will be any different.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Cushy socks but watch the toes
customer_reviews.text: I love Puma as a brand, particularly their shoes and socks. This time, I wasn't disappointed, except with putting them on. My toes always get caught on stitching when I try and slip them on. That's somewhat annoying. Other than that, I love them. They're very cushy, and I can run in them.
customer_reviews.author: bralphx

customer_reviews.title: Great Socks
customer_reviews.text: These are great socks. I wear a 8.5 in shoes, and these socks fit nice and snug. They are new, so they haven't had a chance to wear out, but they stay put and don't slip at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lil' E

customer_reviews.title: Puma women’s socks one size fits most
customer_reviews.text: Nice in the winter time when you live in California a little bit thick to wear with your shoes so nice to wear in the house without shoes beautiful colors great quality wonderful brand
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy! But watch out for sweat.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these socks! They're comfy and come in nice colors. One thing to watch for: these socks have some cotton in them. Because of that, they aren't ultra sweat-wicking, so if you're a distance runner, your feet will start to feel like your feet are about to blister several miles in, because your socks are slightly damp. Other than that, great socks.
customer_reviews.author: amzncustomer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: Some of the most comfortable socks that I have ever worn. They feel like they are reinforced- my feet feel like they are getting a gentle, supportive hug. I’m glad I bought these.
customer_reviews.author: NurseSue

customer_reviews.title: Great thin sport socks!
customer_reviews.text: These were just the socks I've been looking for - they're nice and tight so they don't slip down in your shoe. I normally wear a 9.5 shoe size and the 9-11 socks fit perfectly. They're very thin socks, which is great for summer sports, hiking, and mowing the lawn.
customer_reviews.author: N. Hanks

customer_reviews.title: Horrible! These socks started unraveling as soon as I ...
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! These socks started unraveling as soon as I washed them. They are now jumbled messes of colored yarn.
customer_reviews.author: arte g

customer_reviews.title: Definitely spend the extra money buying a better quality set
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the all black set. They appeared much thinner than I had anticipated. By the end of the first week, I already had a hole worn through in the toe area of my left foot. I have purchased PUMA socks before, but they were a thicker set. Definitely spend the extra money buying a better quality set. I wish I had.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Noppinger

customer_reviews.title: Nice socks! Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with product! Son wears size 4 shoes and kid's socks are way too small and uncomfortable for him now. These are perfect, and there's no way to tell they are "for women". Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: JessJulio

customer_reviews.title: no complaints
customer_reviews.text: i'm usually size 8.5-9 and these fit great: not loose and a little snug. i also really like the "arch support" on the socks; it makes it feel like they won't slip and so far, the socks haven't slipped off my ankles. I had similar ones puma ones before and when the sock started stretching out at the opening, the arch support kept the socks in place anyway. Also i was a bit worried my feet would get hot when running in these because they're a bit thicker but so far my feet feel fine (although weather is becoming cooler so not sure how it would be in summer).
customer_reviews.author: parcpalc

customer_reviews.title: Slides down
customer_reviews.text: Slides down the foot unfortunately. Personally would not recommend for wearing with sneakers if you walk a lot. Perhaps the issue is more with my foot, but I think the socks could benefit from some extra work to reduce slipping.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

product_meta.title: PUMA Women's 6 Pack Runner Socks, Multi-color, 9-11
product_meta.description:
PUMA offers a super-comfy sock that you'll find yourself reaching for every single morning.

Imported, Machine Wash
feature_bullets: Six-pack ankle-high runner socks featuring colorful PUMA logoing
